name: How to die in a Morgue
name_original: How to die in a Morgue
description:
How to die in a Morgue - An Episodic 2D-Adventure

On behalf of the Don, you have to get a family memento of the Mafia. The search leads you to the local morgue ...

As you recover from your unconsciousness, you lie in a body bag. An adventure full of black humor, unexpected events and human abysses begins.

Features

  2D-Adventure for Windows and Mac ¹

unique pixel look
exceptional Setting
atmospheric Soundtrack
German and English Version

¹ You can download the first Episode of How to die in a Morgue for free.

Featured on PC Gamer (Free games of the week)

Feedback & Support

Your feedback is very important to us - support us in improving the game further. Moreover, we are looking forward to your bug reports. We are happy to help you out on our Discord channel. See you there: https://discordapp.com/invite/GyBUaJK
